𒃽 ≈ 𒑘⋅𒐺 ≈ 𒁁 𒐺 late form

𒃽 GAŠAN Geisha gynes lady
𒃽 GAŠAN ga-ša-an rather than standard nin, "lady" in 𒅴𒊩 eme-sal “womens speech”
𒃽 Geisha > Ische

𒊩 in 𒆵 KUŠU ⇔ 𒃽 GAŠAN Geisha

𒅖 𒋗 𒌑 iš-šu-ú Ischen : women אִשָּׁה ʾiššâ ܐܢܬܬܐ ʾa(n)tθ ante andere 𒊩 sinništ con.ist

𜏥𜎂 zana žaná жана́ зан@Tajik gyne san 𓊃𓏏 𓁐 zant жанчы́на žančýna Jeanne Jana

𒀭𒂗 𒀭𒃽 𒈬 𒀭𒁁𒀖 𒆍𒀭𒊏𒆠
ᵈEN ᵈGAŠAN-MU ᵈBe-let KÁ{Bab}.𒀭RA{Iron}.KI
Bēl (Marduk), Bēltīya (Zarpanītu), the Lady of Babylon
